Nadiem Makarim Pastikan Hadir, Pemilihan Rektor ITB Akan Digelar di Jakarta
02 Nov 2019, 09:27 by Catur Ratna Wulandari
BANDUNG, (PR).- Majelis Wali Amanat (MWA) Institut Teknologi Bandung (ITB) akan menggelar rapat pleno untuk menentukan rektor terpilih pada Kamis, 7 November 2019 mendatang di Jakarta. Menteri Pendidikan dan Kebudayaan Nadiem Anwar Makarim dipastikan hadir.
Ketua MWA ITB Yani Panigoro mengatakan, setelah Senat Akademik memilih tiga calon rektor, proses pemilihan kembali ke MWA. Ketiga calon rektor tersebut ialah Jaka Sembiring (Sekolah Teknik Elektro dan Informatika), Kadarsyah Suryadi (Fakultas Teknologi Industri, Rektor ITB 2015-2020), dan Reini D. Wirahadikusuma (Fakultas Teknik Sipil dan Lingkungan).
Rapat terakhir dalam proses Pemilihan Rektor ITB ini akan digelar di Jakarta pada 7 November."Rapat di Jakarta bersama Mas Menteri," kata Yani ditemui di sela-sela acara Ngariung Bareng Calon Rektor ITB di Kampus ITB, Sabtu, 2 November 2019.Ia mengatakan, Mendikbud sudah memastikan akan hadir di rapat tersebut. "Beliau yang minta tanggal 7 November," ujarnya.Yani mengatakan, rapat rencananya akan digelar sekali saja. Penentuan rektor terpilih bisa dilakukan melalui musyawarah maupun voting. "Satu kali (rapat) karena sudah tiga ya," katanya.Rencananya rektor terpilih akan dilantik pada 20 Januari 2020 setelah jabatan rektor saat ini habis. Pada 2020, ITB memasuki usianya yang ke-100 tahun.***

Nadiem Makarim Make Sure to Attend, ITB Chancellor Election Will Be Held in Jakarta
02 Nov 2019, 09:27 by Catur Ratna Wulandari
BANDUNG, (PR) .- Board of Trustees (MWA) of the Bandung Institute of Technology (ITB) will hold a plenary meeting to determine the elected chancellor on Thursday 7 November 2019 in Jakarta. Minister of Education and Culture Nadiem Anwar Makarim is certainly present.
MWA ITB Chair Yani Panigoro said, after the Academic Senate chose three rector candidates, the election process returned to MWA. The three rector candidates are Jaka Sembiring (School of Electrical and Information Engineering), Kadarsyah Suryadi (Faculty of Industrial Technology, Rector of ITB 2015-2020), and Reini D. Wirahadikusuma (Faculty of Civil and Environmental Engineering).
The last meeting in the ITB Chancellor Election process will be held in Jakarta on November 7. "The meeting in Jakarta with the Minister," said Yani, was met on the sidelines of the Ngariung Together event with ITB Rector Candidates at the ITB Campus, Saturday, November 2, 2019. He said The Minister of Education and Culture has confirmed that he will attend the meeting. "He asked for November 7th," he said. Yani said the meeting was planned to be held just once. Determination of the elected chancellor can be done through deliberation and voting. "One time (meeting) because there have been three," he said. The plan was for the elected chancellor to be installed on January 20, 2020 after the current rector's position was up. In 2020, ITB is entering its 100th year. ***
